p: Despite the development and availability of effective analgesic procedures, pain is still underestimated and poorly managed, especially in the critical areas. Nursesâ€™ knowledge about pain plays a significant role in effective clinical decision making for pain management. The objective of the study is describing the level of knowledge and practice of nurses in pain management as well as highlighting the possible barriers that nurses face in assessing and managing acute pain in the critical areas ICU and ER.
